mapper.insert: insert all into MEMBER (mem_id, mem_pass, mem_name, mem_gender, mem_birth, mem_phone, mem_address, mem_type, mem_status, gym_code, mem_height, mem_weight, mem_disease, mem_purpose, mem_interest, mem_inflow, mem_point,mem_regidate) values (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pass}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_gender}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_address}, #{mem_type}, #{mem_status}, #{gym_code}, #{mem_height}, #{mem_weight}, #{mem_disease}, #{mem_purpose}, #{mem_interest}, #{mem_inflow}, #{mem_point}, sysdate) into GYM_DETAIL (gym_code) values (#{gym_code}) select * from dual
mapper.select: select mem_id from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pass=#{mem_pass}
